title: Ben Stiller dotes on daughter Ella Olivia, 17, at Broadway opening of musical The Lightning Thief
text:
Ben Stiller was one proud father as he arrived at the opening night of musical The Lightning Thief in New York Wednesday with his teen daughter.

The actor and director, 53, was all smiles as he posed for photos at the Broadway theatre with Ella Olivia, 17.

She's the eldest of his two children with estranged wife Christine Taylor; he's also dad to son Quinlin Dempsey, 14.

Proud father: Ben Stiller accompanied his daughter Ella Olivia, 17, to the Broadway opening of musical The Lightning Thief on Wednesday night

Ben was casually dressed for the night out, pairing a navy top with indigo jeans and black and white trainers.

He added a khaki green windbreaker.

Ella Olivia opted for a black top and tailored black pants with a black silky zipper jacket.

The teen stepped out in black ankle boots and was made up with black eye-liner and mascara, rosy blush and glossy pink lip color.

Apple of his eye: Ella Olivia is the eldest of his two children with estranged wife Christine Taylor; he's also dad to son Quinlin Dempsey, 14

Night out: Ben was casually dressed, pairing a navy top with indigo jeans and khaki green windbreaker. Ella Olivia opted for a black top, black pants and black silky zipper jacket

Ben had made only sporadic appearances on screen of late, appearing on Saturday Night Live and Arrested Development.

He is more focused these days on producing and directing, after winning plaudits for his 2018 TV mini series Escape at Dannemora.

In addition to developing Dodgeball 2, he is prepping a TV series for Showtime called Super Sad True Love Story.
